commit message: import bluetoothchat files and made build work
created BluetoothViewer as a modification of BluetoothChat
disabled menu option to make android discoverable
changed app name to Bluetooth Viewer
fixed the bug of dubplicate listing of bluetooth devices when scanning
adjusted format of incoming and outgoing messages
append newline character when sending messages, perhaps this will make it work
implemented disconnect and pause functions, but needs to be tested
implemented reading messages from bluetooth line by line, but needs to be tested
bugfix: convert string to bytearray with .getBytes
bugfix: added check to prevent connect/disconnect menu item referencing before initialization
made pause/resume work, and disconnect/connect are shown/hidden correctly
bugfix: removed Context from BluetoothChatService constructor, it is both unnecessary and a common memory leak
removed bluetooth backport and made other necessary changes to get it working with a more modern android phone (motorola MB525, android 2.1)
made keyboard not pop-up automatically when starting the app
drop 'connected to:' text from title, show only device name
added cool-ish toolbar, and many small minor changes
renamed package and other small changes
added scripts to generate drawables for appropriate densities from a large base drawable
improved app icon and toolbar icons
improved graphics generator scripts to allow different dimensions depending on the type of object
background image is no longer generated, simply it is too hard to do right
removed unnecessary stuff from manifest + minor optimizations
made DeviceListActivity show all available devices even if already paired. This is useful when there are many paired devices and you want to see which ones are actually available at the moment
merged some changes from release branch
added --uninstall and --setup-keys options and other improvements to the build script
use full path for all activities
added IntelliJ project file patterns to ignore
cleaned out some warnings in main layout xml
adjusted texts and moved to strings.xml
do not exit automatically, even if there is no bluetooth
added menu options: go to github, rate the app, buy the full version
added LITE in the app name
copied improved build script from manyquiz
minor fixes following Android Studio advices
convert char sequences to string only when needed
application context might be null, apparently
simplified getting address from device list activity
removed pointless comments, methods, and revised log levels
updated javadoc and removed pointless comments
moved messaging constants to the service side, cleanup in logging and others
reorg todo and minor text changes
bugfix in handling connect failed and lost
workaround for bluetooth enable request and screen rotation
